Subject: Re: Message to Hell Beast
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...

Shockwave:




Shockwave listened to Hell Beast.  "Understood." he replied, flying for 
several more minutes.  After reaching the destination, he landed just a dozen 
meters from the ice cave and transformed to his biped mode.

He activated a comm. link via his wrist comm. unit.  "Hell Beast, this is 
Shockwave, I am here.  Deactivate defenses."
